anl.verdi.plot.types

Class AbstractTilePlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • anl.verdi.plot.types.AbstractPlot
      • anl.verdi.plot.types.AbstractTilePlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plot, TimeAnimatablePlot
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TilePlot, VerticalCrossSectionPlot

    public abstract class AbstractTilePlot
extends AbstractPlot
implements TimeAnimatablePlot
    Abstract base class for Tile style plots.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Nick Collier

      • getGlobalMinMax

        public DataUtilities.MinMax getGlobalMinMax()
        Gets the global min max. The global min max is the min max of the entire data frame, not just the particular slice of it that a plot may be currently displaying.
        Returns:
        the global min max.

      • getCurrentMinMax

        public DataUtilities.MinMax getCurrentMinMax()

        Returns:
        the current min max.
